name: imicreation It Services Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: web-deisgners, psd-to-html, psd-to-html5, wordpress-developers, php, flash-animation, seo
overview: IMICREATION was established by a group of experienced professionals under the highly experienced leadership and has had a consistent record of revenue growth and financial stability and has fully owned facility in Faridabad, India. With a talent base of 18 professionals, IMICREATION has a wide range of technical skills in the area of Web Based systems & database management, customer support, outsourced e-business management, designing and development. IMICREATION is a professional web design & Web development company that specializes in providing high-quality Website Design services, Website re-design, Website maintenance & updates, Logos, Corporate Identities, Brochures, Flyers/Advertisements, Wordpress Blogs, E-Commerce Solutions, Search Engine Optimization(SEO), Multimedia Presentations, CD Presentations, Flash Presentations in Faridabad, New Delhi(NCR), India. We have expertise in Photoshop, Corel Draw, Illustrator, Flash, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, AJAX, HTML, HTML5, PHP, etc. Creating design is simple but creating your imaginations is really the work of master of masters. Our organization Values revolve around quality delivery, customer satisfaction & timely delivery of products. We are dedicated to provide excellent service to the numbers of our offshore clients regularly. Besides working on client projects, IMICREATION is constantly innovating and rolling out solutions that improve clients businesses.
